amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to close a loophole created by the Modernizing Regulatory Review by clarifying that Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs must issue a finding for each rule determining whether the rule has a significant economic impact.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Hageman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
